name: Kara the Preacher
description:
4000 px x 2828 px 300 DPI PNG

Kara the Preacher was the third herald who journeyed through the world of Geoda with his companions, Jo-Chi the Watcher and Anga the Ronin. They were sent down from the heavens and tasked to observe the life that was created a millenia ago by their all god. The heralds were also tasked with protecting the inhabitants from the evil stirring from the void and did so for many centuries, fighting, learning and growing to become deities in their own right.
